Summon scrolls will immediately summon a creature that will attack your foes. Strong magicians are able to summon strong and dangerous creatures. Therefore, some cities, such as Semos, have forbidden the usage of these scrolls in their areas.

Under new management. Chest to the right is still held by Semos Bank Merchants Ltd.

FISHING SPOTS IN FAIUMONI The best spot to fish for cod is in Ados, as this species lives in the sea. Trout live in rivers. There is an excellent fishing spot near Fado. Perch reside in rivers and lakes, too. Brave fishermen tell of big catches in the area where the elves dwell. Mackerel can only be fished at the open sea. More exotic fish are found on the island Athor. In a mountain lake near Ados is a spot where char fish are very easy to find. In Semos there is a lake which is rich in roaches.
